text:
You don't have defined the ID "form_settings.form_bg"
Your ID of the choice field is "form_bg"
So either you rename the choice_field ID to "form_settings.form_bg" or you change the controlling_field_path to "form_bg"

Hey <@U0138GAM1UN> thanks for the reply, the fourth color is defined properly and its working Iâ€™m facing issue in setting the visibility of the color field based on the choice field. <@UJAPS2K4N> thanks for pointing that out but I have tried that but the issue still persist.
